title: Web of Dream
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA; The Print Club, Philadelphia, PA, June 1960; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, June 1960 until April 11, 1967 [1]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1967 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased this drawing from the Print Club for $200 (see copy of invoice, Mrs. Beal's check, dated June 1, 1960, and relevant correspondence in curatorial file.) 
[2]. The drawing was accessioned on April 11, 1967.
